column4: In Oneric, how do I add stuff to the panel in Unity (like CPU usage applet, Memory usage applet, etc)?
lm-sensors and sensores-applet
How do I add the sensor applet in Unity? I know how to do it with gnome panel, but unity is so not user-friendly
secon, I'll try , not using unity either, might take a coup of tea
even in 12.04 w/ gnome-panel, I couldn't figure out how to add it...
right-click on panel, add.. but must have run sensors-detect beorehand and added modules, just some minutes, vm booting up
or simply try what happens if you in gnome and then switch surface to unity
can't right click on the panels in Unity, doesn't do anything for me
log into gnome, I can sow you there, may that integrates in unity, too

switch to classic gnome, install there and see if it occurs in unity, too then
